info.+content: 青の祓魔師（エクソシスト）

Orphaned at a young age, Rin Okumura has been raised by the famed exorcist Father Fujimoto as if Rin was Father Fujimoto’s own son. Within time, Rin ended up learning the harsh truth that his biological father is Satan. Upon learning this, Rin enrolls in the mysterious True Cross Academy to become an exorcist with the goal of defeating his own biological father. In the meantime, Rin tries to refrain from revealing that he is the son of Satan, a task that proves to be troublesome whenever his demonic powers arise upon unleashing his dad’s sword.
Madman's Official Blue Exorcist (Manga) Sales Site
